definitions.definition: needing no outside help in satisfying one's basic needs, especially with regard to the production of food.
examples: I don't think Botswana, due to the climate, could ever be self-sufficient in food
their son was a little bit of a loner and very self-sufficient
synonyms: able to stand on one's own two feet; Moreindependent
autarkic "you'll need to be more self-sufficient once you get to college"
